EmailTemplate.subject: Our gift to you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/]]>
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/]]>
<[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.MY/]]>
Introducing Martell Cordon Bleu Intense Heat
Crafted in intensely burnt oak barrels, this limited edition eaux-de-vie is enhanced with the rich aromas of candied-fruit and roasted almonds. Finishing with fiery spice and subtle notes of Vanilla, and Roasted Almond, it’s the iconic Martell Cordon Bleu you already love – turned up a notch.
LEARN MORE <[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/cognacs/intense-heat]]>
Turn Up the Heat in the Year of the Rooster
Martell has partnered with some of Malaysia’s most popular restaurants for a series of unforgettable New Year banquets. Announced in early January, these exclusive packages put you first in line to reserve your family’s Chinese New Year dinner.
Don’t miss out – Follow us on Facebook to be the first in the know.
FOLLOW US <[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.MY/photos/p.1264843876918864/1264843876918864/?type=3&theater]]>
